mapper.select:
select distinct dai.da_application_info_id, dai.application_no, dai.da_application_type_id, dai.applied_date, dai.name, dai.dob, dai.nrc_no, dai.father_name, dai.nationality, dai.nationality_other, dai.gender, dai.marital_status, dai.current_address, dai.current_address_building_no, dai.current_address_room_no, dai.current_address_floor, dai.current_address_street, dai.current_address_qtr, dai.current_address_township, dai.current_address_city, dai.permanent_address, dai.permanent_address_building_no, dai.permanent_address_room_no, dai.permanent_address_floor, dai.permanent_address_street, dai.permanent_address_qtr, dai.permanent_address_township, dai.permanent_address_city, dai.type_of_residence, dai.type_of_residence_other, dai.living_with, dai.living_with_other, dai.year_of_stay_year, dai.year_of_stay_month, dai.mobile_no, dai.resident_tel_no, dai.other_phone_no, dai.email, dai.customer_id, daci.da_applicant_company_info_id, deci.da_emergency_contact_info_id, dgi.da_guarantor_info_id, dai.status, dai.da_interest_info_id, dai.da_compulsory_info_id, dai.da_loan_type_id, dai.finance_amount, dai.finance_term, dai.da_product_type_id, dai.product_description, dai.channel_type, dai.updated_time, dai.updated_by, dai.del_flag, (select created_by from da_application_info_history where da_application_info_id = dai.da_application_info_id and status = dai.status order by created_time desc limit 1) as last_requested_staff_name, daci.company_name as daci_company_name, daci.company_address as daci_company_address, daci.company_address_building_no as daci_company_address_building_no, daci.company_address_room_no as daci_company_address_room_no, daci.company_address_floor as daci_company_address_floor, daci.company_address_street as daci_company_address_street, daci.company_address_qtr as daci_company_address_qtr, daci.company_address_township as daci_company_address_township, daci.company_address_city as daci_company_address_city, daci.company_tel_no as daci_company_tel_no, daci.contact_time_from as daci_contact_time_from, daci.contact_time_to as daci_contact_time_to, daci.department as daci_department, daci.position as daci_position, daci.year_of_service_year as daci_year_of_service_year, daci.year_of_service_month as daci_year_of_service_month, daci.company_status as daci_company_status, daci.company_status_other as daci_company_status_other, daci.monthly_basic_income as daci_monthly_basic_income, daci.other_income as daci_other_income, daci.total_income as daci_total_income, daci.salary_day as daci_salary_day, deci.name as deci_name, deci.relationship as deci_relationship, deci.relationship_other as deci_relationship_other, deci.current_address as deci_current_address, deci.current_address_building_no as deci_current_address_building_no, deci.current_address_room_no as deci_current_address_room_no, deci.current_address_floor as deci_current_address_floor, deci.current_address_street as deci_current_address_street, deci.current_address_qtr as deci_current_address_qtr, deci.current_address_township as deci_current_address_township, deci.current_address_city as deci_current_address_city, deci.mobile_no as deci_mobile_no, deci.resident_tel_no as deci_resident_tel_no, deci.other_phone_no as deci_other_phone_no, dgi.name as dgi_name, dgi.dob as dgi_dob, dgi.nrc_no as dgi_nrc_no, dgi.nationality as dgi_nationality, dgi.nationality_other as dgi_nationality_other, dgi.mobile_no as dgi_mobile_no, dgi.resident_tel_no as dgi_resident_tel_no, dgi.relationship as dgi_relationship, dgi.relationship_other as dgi_relationship_other, dgi.current_address as dgi_current_address, dgi.current_address_building_no as dgi_current_address_building_no, dgi.current_address_room_no as dgi_current_address_room_no, dgi.current_address_floor as dgi_current_address_floor, dgi.current_address_street as dgi_current_address_street, dgi.current_address_qtr as dgi_current_address_qtr, dgi.current_address_township as dgi_current_address_township, dgi.current_address_city as dgi_current_address_city, dgi.type_of_residence as dgi_type_of_residence, dgi.type_of_residence_other as dgi_type_of_residence_other, dgi.living_with as dgi_living_with, dgi.living_with_other as dgi_living_with_other, dgi.gender as dgi_gender, dgi.marital_status as dgi_marital_status, dgi.year_of_stay_year as dgi_year_of_stay_year, dgi.year_of_stay_month as dgi_year_of_stay_month, dgi.company_name as dgi_company_name, dgi.company_tel_no as dgi_company_tel_no, dgi.company_address as dgi_company_address, dgi.company_address_building_no as dgi_company_address_building_no, dgi.company_address_room_no as dgi_company_address_room_no, dgi.company_address_floor as dgi_company_address_floor, dgi.company_address_street as dgi_company_address_street, dgi.company_address_qtr as dgi_company_address_qtr, dgi.company_address_township as dgi_company_address_township, dgi.company_address_city as dgi_company_address_city, dgi.department as dgi_department, dgi.position as dgi_position, dgi.year_of_service_year as dgi_year_of_service_year, dgi.year_of_service_month as dgi_year_of_service_month, dgi.monthly_basic_income as dgi_monthly_basic_income, dgi.total_income as dgi_total_income, dpi.da_purchase_info_id, dpi.product_code, dpi.product_name, dpi.da_loan_type_id as purchase_loan_type, dpi.agreement_no, dpi.purchase_date, dpi.model, dpi.brand, dpi.price, dpi.cash_down_amount, dpi.outlet_id, dpi.outlet_name, dpi.invoice_no, dpi.agent_id, dpi.agent_name, dpi.status as purchase_status, dpi.settlement_amount, daih.settlement_pending_comment, dii.interest_rate, dci.compulsory_amount from da_application_info dai left join da_applicant_company_info daci on dai.da_application_info_id = daci.da_application_info_id left join da_emergency_contact_info deci on dai.da_application_info_id = deci.da_application_info_id left join da_guarantor_info dgi on dai.da_application_info_id = dgi.da_application_info_id left join da_application_info_history as daih on dai.da_application_info_id = daih.da_application_info_id left join da_purchase_info as dpi on dai.da_application_info_id = dpi.da_application_info_id left join da_interest_info as dii on dai.da_interest_info_id = dii.da_interest_info_id left join da_compulsory_info as dci on dai.da_compulsory_info_id = dci.da_compulsory_info_id
dpi.del_flag=false AND dai.DEL_FLAG = false AND (dai.status = 16 or dai.status = 17) AND dai.status = daih.status
AND LOWER(dai.application_no) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicationNo} || '%')
AND dai.status = #{status}
AND LOWER(dai.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicantName} || '%')
AND LOWER(dai.mobile_no) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicantPhoneNo} || '%')
AND LOWER(dai.nrc_no) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicantNrcNo} || '%')
AND TO_CHAR(dai.applied_date::DATE,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(#{newApplicationDateFrom,jdbcType=DATE}::DATE,'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(dai.applied_date::DATE,'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(#{newApplicationDateTo,jdbcType=DATE}::DATE,'YYYYMMDD')
AND LOWER(dpi.agent_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{agentName} || '%')
AND LOWER(dpi.outlet_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{outletName} || '%')
AND daih.created_by IN
#{item}
ORDER BY dai.application_no ASC
ORDER BY dai.application_no DESC
ORDER BY dai.name ASC
ORDER BY dai.name DESC
ORDER BY dai.nrc_no ASC
ORDER BY dai.nrc_no DESC
ORDER BY dai.mobile_no ASC
ORDER BY dai.mobile_no DESC
ORDER BY dpi.agreement_no ASC
ORDER BY dpi.agreement_no DESC
ORDER BY dpi.agent_name ASC
ORDER BY dpi.agent_name DESC
ORDER BY dpi.outlet_name ASC
ORDER BY dpi.outlet_name DESC
ORDER BY dpi.price ASC
ORDER BY dpi.price DESC
ORDER BY dpi.settlement_amount ASC
ORDER BY dpi.settlement_amount DESC
ORDER BY dai.status ASC
ORDER BY dai.status DESC
ORDER BY daih.settlement_pending_comment ASC
ORDER BY daih.settlement_pending_comment DESC
ORDER BY daih.created_by ASC
ORDER BY daih.created_by DESC
ORDER BY dai.applied_date ASC
ORDER BY dai.applied_date DESC
ORDER BY dai.application_no ASC
OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT DAIA.DA_APPLICATION_INFO_ATTACHMENT_ID, DAIA.FILE_PATH, DAIA.FILE_TYPE FROM da_application_info_attachment DAIA WHERE DAIA.DA_APPLICATION_INFO_ID = #{da_application_info_id}

select count(distinct(dai.application_no)) from da_application_info dai left join da_applicant_company_info daci on dai.da_application_info_id = daci.da_application_info_id left join da_emergency_contact_info deci on dai.da_application_info_id = deci.da_application_info_id left join da_guarantor_info dgi on dai.da_application_info_id = dgi.da_application_info_id left join da_application_info_history as daih on dai.da_application_info_id = daih.da_application_info_id left join da_purchase_info as dpi on dai.da_application_info_id = dpi.da_application_info_id left join da_interest_info as dii on dai.da_interest_info_id = dii.da_interest_info_id left join da_compulsory_info as dci on dai.da_compulsory_info_id = dci.da_compulsory_info_id
dpi.del_flag=false AND dai.DEL_FLAG = false AND (dai.status = 16 or dai.status = 17) AND dai.status = daih.status
AND LOWER(dai.application_no) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicationNo} || '%')
AND dai.status = #{status}
AND LOWER(dai.name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicantName} || '%')
AND LOWER(dai.mobile_no) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicantPhoneNo} || '%')
AND LOWER(dai.nrc_no) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{applicantNrcNo} || '%')
AND TO_CHAR(dai.applied_date::DATE,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(#{newApplicationDateFrom,jdbcType=DATE}::DATE,'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(dai.applied_date::DATE,'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(#{newApplicationDateTo,jdbcType=DATE}::DATE,'YYYYMMDD')
AND LOWER(dpi.agent_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{agentName} || '%')
AND LOWER(dpi.outlet_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{outletName} || '%')
AND daih.created_by IN
#{item}
